level.text: Subject to ยง 7901.2, a license issued pursuant to this chapter shall expire at
12:00 midnight of December 31st of each even-numbered year.
If the Director changes the renewal system pursuant to ยง 4006.3 of chapter

40 of this title, a license issued pursuant to this chapter shall expire at 12:00 midnight on the last day of the month of the birth of the holder of the license, or other date established by the Director.
